sys_script_include.name: Resolule

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e05862542f7c3010773e2b5df699b65e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_631216_yunit.Resolule</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Récupérer la date de résolution</description><name>Resolule</name><script><![CDATA[var Resolule = Class.create();
Resolule.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isDatePast: function(strDate){
		// Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
		var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
		var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);
		
		// If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
		if (testdate.before(rightnow)) {
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},

    type: 'Resolule'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-13 13:16:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>e05862542f7c3010773e2b5df699b65e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Resolule</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Yunit" source="x_631216_yunit">6117b1442f303010773e2b5df699b69a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Yunit">6117b1442f303010773e2b5df699b69a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e05862542f7c3010773e2b5df699b65e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-13 13:16:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
